fields.summary: Articles should open from any new content preview
fields.description:
**Steps:**
Articles should open from any new content preview using the same Manual suite as any article in the mixed feed

fields.summary: Videos should open from any new content preview
fields.description:
**Steps:**
Videos should open from any new content preview using the same Manual suite as the mixed feed

fields.summary: VSM content should open from any new content preview
fields.description:
**Steps:**
VSM content should open from any new content preview using the same Manual suite as the mixed feed.  This should include the special case scenarios such as opening game stories in native chrome.

fields.summary: Short content should open from any new content preview
fields.description:
**Steps:**
Short content should open from any new content preview using the same Manual suite as the mixed feed.

fields.summary: All stories should follow the same Manual suite as the mixed feed
fields.description:
**Steps:**
All stories should follow the same Manual suite as the mixed feed.  Changes to the URL mapping as being specified for groups should follow the same pattern present for home where grouped stories are opened (this functionality is not in today but should be picked up by the newer modules).
